itemDescription: British businessman and accountant in Hong Kong

wikipedia_page.main: Donald Black was a British businessman and accountant in Hong Kong. Black was a partner of the Peat, Marwick, Mitchell & Co. until he retired in March 1962. He was appointed provisionally to the Legislative Council as an unofficial member during the absence of Hugh Barton from July to November 1960.

response: *Donald Black (business executive), British businessman and accountant in Hong Kong
